full_summary:
### Certificate of Lease for a Vessel for Patrol Purposes  
#### Request for Proposal
## Tender Details

*Tender Title:* Passenger Vessel for Hire by Conservation and Protection for Patrols in waters surrounding the shores of Prince Edward Island

*Reference Number:* PW-23-01029990
*Solicitation Number:* 30004105
*Tender Closing Date:* 2023-03-29T13:00:00 (Closed)

## Bidding Requirements

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a proposal from a qualified vendor to provide a fishing vessel for patrol purposes. The vessel must be between 40 to 44 feet in length, with a captain and one crew member on board.

**Services Required:**
The vessel will be used for inspections and patrols in lobster, rock crab, herring, recreational mackerel, striped bass, tuna, groundfish fisheries, and others as required. The vessel must be capable of hauling lobster traps, crab traps, gill nets (herring/groundfish), shellfish harvesting gear, long lines, and other types of fishing gear and apparatus.

**Vessel Requirements:**

* The vessel must have a large enough deck space to accommodate the stacking of a minimum of 25 crab traps (diameter of traps is usually between 6-7 feet) or at least 50 lobster traps.
* The vessel must be capable of achieving a minimum required speed of 20 knots and maintaining a cruising speed of 20kts or above for a prolonged period (unloaded).
* The vessel must be equipped with an acceptable lavatory facility.

## Proposal Submission

To be considered, proposals must be submitted electronically to [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca). The complete proposal package, including all relevant documents, must be attached to the electronic submission. For further information, contact the person designated below.

*Name and Title:* Martin, Kimberly, Purchaser
*Email:* [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*Phone:* 506-429-2397
## Proposal Documents

All proposal documents can be downloaded electronically from [Canada’s buy and sell website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/14/
